short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a page action for HTML pages containing a video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using the webpage to play music or movies, when you need to do other work and have to leave this page, how to control the music or movies you playing, this extension provides you in the browser to let you control the playback as you want.
